text: Rama'a ha' vahe'mo'za maka'za eri haviza hunaku hagage kokampima me'nea agonaramimpina hago e'naze. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamo ana vahera hanige'za e'za mopamofona mago atumpareti vuno mago atumparega vanige'za bainati kazinkanonteti vahera eme zamahe hana hugahaze. Ana hina mago vahe'mo'a atreno freno agura ovazigahie.
